entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cochise County through 445 PM MST... entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued August 11 at 10:28AM ChST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WETTER WEATHER POSSIBLE NEXT WEEK... This Hydrologic Outlook is for Guam, Rota, Tinian and Saipan in the Mariana Islands. A series of passing disturbances could bring periods of heavy rain to the above islands from Monday August 15th to Friday August 19th. Sufficient heavy rain could cause urban and small stream flooding.

entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FOR LEEWARD AREAS TODAY... .The combination of dry fuels, strong and gusty trade winds, and low relative humidity will result in critical fire conditions at times today.
